about_the_game:
Something seems to be missing in my heart... what is it?

I really really want this thing, even if I can't eat enough food or get good sleep, I still want it!

Where is this? The road To Eternity? Is what I'm looking for Eternity? It's Eternity!

Gameplay
This is a fast-paced combat game integrating RPG, hack and slash, and action. A battle only lasts 13 minutes!
In this fast-paced era, it may be difficult for some people to sit down and study a game for a long time, some of them may want to collect props and complete achievements, but they give up because it takes too long. "To Eternity" can well meet the needs of such players. Even players with only fragmented time can get accumulation in only 13 minutes of battle, and gain the satisfaction of enhancing your character and collecting items!

As the main character, in order to find the lack in your heart, you came to a secret realm by accident, and embarked on the path of pursuing Eternity. Start the Eternal Battle in the secret realm, there will be 10 waves of monsters attacking you, which is the challenge from Eternity. You will perform tense and exciting hacks and slashes, defeat these monsters with your weapon and fighting skills, get gold from the monsters and challenges, buy attributes to improve your abilities, and defeat the final Boss. Moving towards your Eternity!

When the boss is not defeated within the specified time, or you were defeated by the monsters, or there are more than 40 monsters in the map for 10 seconds, one of the three conditions is met, the game fails! So you may be careful, and need to hurry up!

Through continuous attempts, you can gradually understand the gameplay and the process of the game, master the way and timing of spending golds, and improve your character's abilities to an unprecedented level!

Features
Way to spend gold

Character's abilities are up to you

10 waves of different enemies

2 distinctive Boss

4 skill challenges

12 ability challenges

Infinite mirror challenges

20 Eternal Artifacts

Push the limits of one's ability

Realization of desires and life
